description:
If you have or know anyone with Alzheimers or Dementia- you know what a life-changing and horrific degenerative disease-condition it is. Learn changes you can make that will improve their daily life. Help them be more clear, and present. Less stress, better clarity, fewer emotional outbursts.

  • 5.2 million Americans suffer from this disease
  • 6th leading cause of death
  • 1 in 3 seniors suffers from Alzheimers or a dementia
  • 2013 cost US 203 BILLION dollars

what you will learn in this series: .

  1. A medical and functional understanding of what takes place
  2. How dietary changes can minimise the uncontrolled activity and emotional outburts/ frustrations
  3. Vitamins and supplements that support cognitive function and minimise stress/anxiety/activity
  4. The role and benefit of exercises and activities, and suggestions to implement them.
title: Holistic & Practical Support for Alzheimer/Caregiver health
